name: Challenge: Count values higher than given value
description: Write a function solve(limit, array) that will return the number of elements of the array that are larger than the limit.

verifications.name: Big array ~100,000 elements
verifications.array: function generate() {const array = []; for (i = 0; i < 100000; i++) {array.push(Math.round(Math.random() * 1000))}; return array}

implementation: const solve = (limit, array) => array.filter(e => e > limit).length
